og.title: Anna Faris
og.description: Anna Faris portrays Erica in Friends, in the episodes "The One With The Birth Mother", "The One Where Joey Speaks French", "The One With Rachel's Going Away Party", and "The Last One, Part 1". She recently portrayed as Christly Plunkett in CBS sitcom Mom. TRIVIA In 2008, she starred in The House Bunny with Rumer Willis, eldest daughter of Bruce Willis and Demi Moore.
